thread.title: NASA is about to unveil new discoveries on exoplanets this week!
thread.title_full: NASA is about to unveil new discoveries on exoplanets this week!

title: NASA is about to unveil new discoveries on exoplanets this week!
text:
NASA is about to unveil new discoveries on exoplanets this week! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 12:44 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: The world of space is a mysterious one, full of secrets that are waiting to be known. Scientists and astronomers are leaving no stone unturned to figure out the story of the universe and looks like this time they've found something big! 
In a press release, NASA has hinted big time at a discovery of something exciting related to planets that orbit stars other than our sun, known as exoplanets, which the space agency is all set to reveal at a news conference. 
The US space agency said it will hold a news conference to present the findings at the agency's headquarters in Washington on Wednesday, February 22. 
Prominent NASA scientists, astronomers and a professor of planetary science and physics at Massachusetts Institute of Technology will participate at the briefing. 
NASA has also invited media and the public to ask questions during the briefing on Twitter using the hashtag #askNASA. 
Following the briefing, a Reddit AMA (Ask Me Anything) about exoplanets will be held with scientists available to answer questions in English and Spanish, NASA said. 
Details of these findings will also be published in the journal Nature on the same day NASA hosts the briefing. 
(With IANS inputs) First Published: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 - 12:42 More from zeenews
